title: IPCL, E2S to develop Thermal Energy Storage System for efficient storage, transmission
description: India Power Corporation Ltd and E2S Power develop a 250Kwh TESS for efficient energy storage, aiding in integrating renewable energy and supporting India's net zero emission targets. The technology ensures flexibility in thermal power operations, aligns with Make in India, and targets South East Asia.
